title: Illumina Names New CIO to Increase Its IT Agility
sub_head: Carissa Rollins joins the genome-sequencing company from UnitedHealthcare Services, where she was also CIO. Illumina is facing increased demand amid a wider call for personalized medicine
body:
The new chief information officer of genome-sequencing company Illumina Inc. plans to scale out the company’s IT infrastructure, as it confronts rising demand for the personalized precision medicine that genomics can provide.
Carissa Rollins, previously CIO of UnitedHealthcare Services Inc., stepped into her new post on Monday. She will be Illumina’s first CIO to report directly to the chief executive officer, a sign of the growing strategic role of IT in the company, CEO Francis deSouza said.
